renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: the amount of Gold the sender wants to stake

toggleStakeVaultLock().details: Only owner function to toggle lock

balanceOf(address).notice: get GBAR staked for an account

directStake(address,uint256).notice: when a user purchases GBAR, the GBAR token can automatically be staked

getEntryIndexer().notice: when user unstake an entry is set to 0. To exclude this entry from the list, we need to check if the entry is 0 or not. then it's added to a new list and returned.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: get timestamp of the last time the reward was distributed

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: When someone transfers random ERC20 token to this contract, the owner can recover it and sends back to ERC20 token to the user.

stakeVaultLocked().notice: get boolean if stakevault is locked

totalSupply().notice: get totalSupply of GBAR staked. This amount represents the total GBAR in the vault
